title: Decryption Challenge
description: Test your decryption skills! Decrypt the message before time runs out.

instructions.step1: Look at the encrypted message and the decryption method
instructions.step2: Manually decrypt the message using the given cipher and key
instructions.step3: Enter your answer in the input field and submit
instructions.step4: Score points for each correct decryption
instructions.step5: Race against the clock to get the highest score!

secretPageDescription: Congratulations on finding the secret admin mode! Test your encryption and decryption skills in this exclusive game.
